about_the_game:
This DLC removes the watermark that is usually shown while using the webcam face tracking. Nothing changes about the tracking quality, so please make sure you are happy with the tracking before you purchase this DLC.

Thank you for supporting the development of VTube Studio <3

Note: This only removes the watermark that's shown for webcam tracking. If you plan to use iOS/Android tracking, the DLC in the smartphone version is required instead of this.
detailed_description:
This DLC removes the watermark that is usually shown while using the webcam face tracking. Nothing changes about the tracking quality, so please make sure you are happy with the tracking before you purchase this DLC.

Thank you for supporting the development of VTube Studio <3

Note: This only removes the watermark that's shown for webcam tracking. If you plan to use iOS/Android tracking, the DLC in the smartphone version is required instead of this.
legal_notice: This app is an indie production and is not developed by Live2D Inc., but is officially licensed to use the Live2D Cubism SDK.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Webcam tracking requires webcam.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Webcam tracking requires webcam.

name: VTube Studio - Remove Watermark

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 2GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Webcam tracking requires webcam.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Webcam tracking requires webcam.

short_description: Removes watermark for OpenSeeFace webcam face tracking.
